company.name: Okynus Tech
company.tagline: Protecting digital IP with industry first DRM solutions
company.mission: At Okynus Tech, we're reimagining content protection for the digital age. Our industry first Digital Rights Management platform safeguards creative works against unauthorized access and distribution while providing seamless experiences for legitimate users.

features.title: Next-Gen Protection
features.description: Proprietary encryption algorithms designed specifically for multimedia content.

features.title: Live Data Security
features.description: Revoke access from end users at any time.

features.title: User-Friendly
features.description: Seamless experience for authorized users with minimal friction.

features.title: Enterprise-Ready
features.description: Scalable solutions for businesses of all sizes, from indie creators to media giants.

technologies: Custom encryption algorithms specifically designed for video and audio content
Live access control and usage tracking

team.name: Aarsh Chaurasia
team.description: Leading the team to build the future of digital content protection.
